CustomField.formula: if(RecordType.Name = "Vascular Standard", CASE(Last_Stage__c, "Qualified Prospect", "10% - Target.", "Target.", "10% - Target.", "Pre Budget Approval", "10% - Pre Budget Approval", "Needs Analysis", "20% - Needs Analysis", "Financial Decision", "30% - Value Proposition", "Value Proposition", "30% - Value Proposition", "Post Budget Approval", "50% - Trial/Evaluation.", "Trial/Evaluation.", "50% - Trial/Evaluation.", "Financial Decision.", "75% - Financial Decision.", "Trial/Evaluation", "75% - Financial Decision.", "Budget Allocated", "90% - Budget Allocated", "Target.", "10% - Target.", NULL ), CASE(Last_Stage__c, "Qualified Prospect", "10% - Qualified Prospect", "Target.", "10% - Target.", "Pre Budget Approval", "10% - Pre Budget Approval", "Needs Analysis", "20% - Needs Analysis", "Financial Decision", "30% - Financial Decision", "Value Proposition", "30% - Value Proposition", "Post Budget Approval", "50% - Post Budget Approval", "Trial/Evaluation.", "50% - Trial/Evaluation.", "Financial Decision.", "75% - Financial Decision.", "Trial/Evaluation", "75% - Financial Decision.", "Budget Allocated", "90% - Budget Allocated", "Target.", "10% - Target.", NULL ) )
CustomField.label: Last Stage Bucket
